name: Crystal Maiden
title: Rylai
lore: Born in a temperate realm, Rylai was always fascinated by the cold. She learned to channel her love of winter into magical power.

crystalNova.name: Crystal Nova
crystalNova.description: A burst of frost that damages and slows enemies in a target area.

frostbite.name: Frostbite
frostbite.description: Encases an enemy in ice, preventing movement and dealing damage over time.

arcaneAura.name: Arcane Aura
arcaneAura.description: Provides bonus mana regeneration to all allies globally.

freezingField.name: Freezing Field
freezingField.description: Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow and damage enemies. Channeled.
